sense.name: The state of two people being coupled (religiously or legally).
sense.examples: I know we'll have a long and happy marriage. God bless this marriage! His second marriage was happier than the first.

sense.name: The act of marrying.
sense.examples: Their marriage was conducted in the chapel. Our marriage occurs in one week.

sense.name: A close and intimate union of activities or concepts.
sense.examples: The marriage of music and dance is truly lovely. We had a marriage of ideas.
